MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA10 postcode area of Kilbarchan, affecting properties in Low Barholm and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 09:16am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:12am on the 27th of November 2020
